sentences.en: a CD collection covering the band from its inception in 1994
sentences.cn: 一套包括该乐队自1994年成立以来所有曲目在内的激光唱片

sentences.en: Almost from its inception it follows a developmental pattern sharply divergent from that of the zygote.
sentences.cn: 它几乎一开始就遵循与合子显然不同的发育模式.

sentences.en: At its core, the blues has remained the same since its inception.
sentences.cn: 其核心自打其出现一直保持不变.

sentences.en: C ++ has been a copy - semantics language since its inception.
sentences.cn: 自C++诞生以来,它一直是拷贝语义的语言.

sentences.en: He had been director of the project since its inception.
sentences.cn: 这项工作从一开始他就是负责人.

sentences.en: However, its membership has grown considerably since its inception.
sentences.cn: 最初的会员人数为大约十人.

sentences.en: I once burned for you. Ising not now is an inception.
sentences.cn: 我曾经为你烧过一次. 但是不是现在而是一开始.

sentences.en: Ising not now is an inception.
sentences.cn: 但是不是现在而是一开始.

sentences.en: Julia's worked for that company from its inception.
sentences.cn: 自从那家公司开办以来,朱莉娅一直在那儿工作.

sentences.en: Since inception in 1993, his average annualised return is 11.1 per cent.
sentences.cn: 自1993年基金成立以来, 尼德霍夫的平均年化回报率达11%.

sentences.en: The club has grown rapidly since its inception in 1990.
sentences.cn: 这个俱乐部自从1990年成立以来发展迅速。

sentences.en: The CPI methodology has been continuously improved since its inception.
sentences.cn: cpi方法体系自采用以来不断地得到完善.

sentences.en: The programme has been successful since its inception.
sentences.cn: 这个方案自开始实施以来一直卓有成效.

sentences.en: The Winter Games have undergone significant changes since their inception.
sentences.cn: 自举行以来,冬奥会经历了巨大的变化.

sentences.en: This law has remained relatively intact with minor improvements since its inception.
sentences.cn: 这个法律自签发后至今尚未做出任何修改.

sentences.en: Yesterday's data illustrate some key features of the recovery at its inception.
sentences.cn: 昨日的数据展现了本轮复苏正处在初始阶段的一些关键特征.

trans.tran_cn: 开始，开端，初期，获得学位
trans.tran_en: the start of an organization or institution
